headline: NXPI Q3 Deep Dive: Signs of Automotive and Industrial Recovery Amid Inventory Normalization
summary: Chip manufacturer NXP Semiconductors (NASDAQ: NXPI) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, but sales fell by 2.4% year on year to $3.17 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $3.3 billion, coming in 1.9% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.11 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: NXP Completes Acquisitions of Aviva Links and Kinara to Advance Automotive Connectivity and AI at the Intelligent Edge
summary: EINDHOVEN, The Netherlands, Oct. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ: NXPI) has announced the completion of its acquisitions of Aviva Links, and Kinara. On October 24, 2025, NXP closed the previously announced acquisition of Aviva Links for $243 million in cash before closing adjustments. Aviva Links is a provider of Automotive SerDes Alliance (ASA) compliant-in-vehicle connectivity solutions. The Aviva Links acquisition complements and expands NXP’s automotive networkin
